tenxfeedbackanalytics.name: tenxanalysismcp
tenxfeedbackanalytics.description: Tenx MCP Sense telemetry - tracks agent/system behavior for debugging and analysis

twitter.name: mcp-server-twitter
twitter.description: Twitter/X integration - exposes post_content, reply_content, read_mentions tools. Used by Worker agents for social actions.

weaviate.name: mcp-server-weaviate
weaviate.description: Weaviate vector database - exposes search_memory, upsert_memory tools. Used by Planner/Worker for long-term semantic memory retrieval.

coinbase.name: mcp-server-coinbase
coinbase.description: Coinbase AgentKit - exposes wallet_get_balance, wallet_transfer, deploy_token tools. Used by CFO Judge and commerce_manager skill for agentic commerce.

ideogram.name: mcp-server-ideogram
ideogram.description: Ideogram image generation - exposes generate_image tool with character_reference_id support. Used by content_generator skill.

runway.name: mcp-server-runway
runway.description: Runway video generation - exposes generate_video tool (tier: daily/hero). Used by content_generator skill for video content.

news.name: mcp-server-news
news.description: News aggregation - exposes trend_resource_read resource. Used by trend_fetcher skill and Planner perception system.

sqlite.name: mcp-server-sqlite
sqlite.description: SQLite reference implementation - used for local testing and development. Not used in production.

notes.usage: MCP servers are used by Planner, Worker, and Judge agents. All external I/O must go through MCP - no direct API calls from agent core.
notes.security: API keys stored in environment variables or secret manager. Never commit secrets to repo.
notes.testing: Use testnet/simulator modes for coinbase, dry-run flags for social platforms during development.
